name: I'm a Copycat
description:
"I'm a Copycat", a story between Lucy and Declan, a pair that are very much in love. Poor Lucy has problems with her memory but Declan strives to look after her and keep her safe. It seems that simply nothing can disturb their peaceful, perfect lives together.

For now anyways~

Enjoy reading about the happy couple and gush at the three wholesome endings you can achieve! I haven't the faintest clue why the creator is so insistent on calling this a psychological horror, haha~!
